column5: Well I was up at nipissing this week end  were my mom got the cottage I didn't get to fish just clean up the cottage an  put carpet down paint all that kind of fun stuff
sooo whens the OFC BBQ?   Gerritt.
Looks like a nice place. Did she just buy it?

We started looking at the beginning of last year to buy  my mom and stepdad wanted some for the whole family to enjoy and for me to do allot more fishing .I don't know what my wife and 2 kids will think of that I'll just have to get my 2 girl into fishing . It is in the North West Bay of lake Nipissing pretty much in the town of Lavigne .My mom will probably rent it out half the time and the family will use it the rest.
Congrats, I'm sure it's the start of many fond memories. Especially for the kids.
Very nice place! ANd good ty know it might be for rent.

You have plunked down in prime Nipp. fishing area the mouth of the west bay is heaven. Day trips to the French and try to hook into a resedent pike, probably the strongest pike l have cought. Caution Nipp. can turn into Hells fury so pay attention to the winds. Enjoy heaven.  Peace
That is one very fine looking cottage.   Oh boy ... would I love to have something like that. Aren't mom's the greatest !!!!!!
